          <title>
            <string language="en">How to make a toy flower</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man eine Spielzeugblume bildet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment faire une fleur de jouet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como fazer uma flor do brinquedo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come fare un fiore del giocattolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να κάνει ένα λουλούδι παιχνιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo hacer una flor del juguete</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third in a series of four illustrations teaching pupils how to make a toy flower. These are for the petals and sepals of the flower.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flowers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">petals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sepals</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen 
Pupillen unterrichtend, wie man eine Spielzeugblume bildet. 
Diese sind für die Blumenblätter und die sepals der Blume.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers dans une série derrière quatre pupilles 
d'illustrations enseignant comment faire une fleur de jouet. 
Ceux-ci sont pour les pétales et les sépales de la fleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third em uma série a quatro pupilas das 
ilustrações que ensina como fazer uma flor do brinquedo. Estes
são para as pétalas e os sepals da flor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terzo in serie di quattro pupille delle 
illustrazioni che insegna come fare un fiore del giocattolo. 
Questi sono per i petali ed i sepals del fiore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
διδάσκουν τους μαθητές πώς να κάνει ένα λουλούδι παιχνιδιών. 
Αυτοί είναι για τα πέταλα και sepals του λουλουδιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero en una serie a cuatro pupilas de las 
ilustraciones que enseña cómo hacer una flor del juguete. 
Éstos están para los pétalos y los sepals de la flor.</string>
          </description>
